name: 6-3-5 Method
description:
Aim: to use quick sketches to come up with concepts

Process:

  • 6 people – 3 concepts – 5 minutes (change numbers to suit your team)
  • 6 participants generate 3 ideas in 5 minutes
  • At the end of the time, participants move to a new “table” and use the ideas already drawn there for inspiration on the next round
  • 6 rounds of this -> 108 ideas
